name: Flying Car Shooting
description:
-- Get ready for battle!!! --
Got what it takes to compete in deadly battles of destruction?! Unlock and upgrade your own futuristic sci-fi flying cars and choose from a huge range of weapons and modifications to create the ultimate war machine!

Set in the distant future where flying cars rule the skies, take off and fight against drivers gone rogue ready to blow you out of the skies!

Get equipped with some real firepower from a huge range of heat-seeking missiles, mag-rifle charged rounds, heavy repeater laser turrets, ion cannons, laser rifles and so much more!

-- What are you waiting for?! --
- Realistic destructible vehicle & world damage!
- Responsive easy to use flying car controls.
- Online leaderboard, get the top rank!
- Tons of vehicles to upgrade & customise.
- Huge range of turrets parts & upgrades.
- Mix & match parts to create an unstoppable loadout!
- Collectable powerups for ultimate chaos!!
- Unique special vehicle abilities.

-- Build, upgrade, customise then cause chaos! --
Build the ultimate flying car and use it to earn cash and ranks as you take down enemies to unlock new vehicles, customisations, armor enhancements, thruster boosters and upgrade your vehicles power level!

Unlock new flying cars, turrets, abilities and more as you take down your opponents and work your way up the online leaderboards!

Become the best pilot and unlock tons of new and incredible flying police cars, trucks and super cars then take to the skies and shoot up your enemies!

-- Your mission! --
Experience real flying car simulation flight combat like never before! Fly through busy future city streets with a fully destructible environment & battle it out with other drivers for complete flying car carnage!

With easy-to-play controls, everyone can enjoy the flying car shooting experience, but it takes a pro to be the ultimate future flying champion as you make your way to the top of the online leaderboards.

Take out as many enemies flying vehicles before your flying car is wrecked to become the ultimate flying car pilot.

Fly your car in the huge future city, find amazing vehicle power-ups like bubble shields to deflect bullets, an atomizer to shrink your flying car so small to evade the gunfire, system overdrive for non-stop action to unload all your gunfire!

Find hidden collectables throughout the city such as gems and silver to further upgrade your cars to get the best weapons and perks for the ultimate flying car simulation experience!

Don't miss out on the latest flying car simulation action, join in the fun and fly high in the future city skies and battle it out with other drivers for the ultimate thrills!

Flying Car Shooting is the latest thrill-seeking adventure that will have you on the edge of your seat, play now for the flying and shooting simulator car driving fun now!
